mapper.select: select mr.id,mr.user_id,mr.date,mr.description,d.name as doctorName, mr.checkinfo,mr.disease_history,mr.diagnosis, mr.comment,mr.remark,mr.diagnostictype,mr.status,mr.insurance_type, p.name,p.sex,p.birthday,p.tel,md.name as deptName from medical_record mr join patient_user_info_card p on mr.user_id=p.id join doctor d on d.id=mr.doctor_id join medical_dept md on md.id=mr.dept_id where 1=1 and p.name like '%${name}%' and d.name like '%${doctor_name}%' and md.id=${dept_id} and mr.date= STR_TO_DATE('${date}','%Y-%m-%d') and mr.status!=3 limit ${length} offset #{start}

select count(*) from medical_record mr join patient_user_info_card p on mr.user_id=p.id join doctor d on d.id=mr.doctor_id join medical_dept md on md.id=mr.dept_id where 1=1 and p.name like '%${name}%' and d.name like '%${doctor_name}%' and md.id=${dept_id} and mr.date= STR_TO_DATE('${date}','%Y-%m-%d') and mr.status!=3

select m.id,m.user_id as userId,m.date,m.prescription,m.diagnosis,p.name,p.sex,p.birthday,p.tel, d.name as doctorName,md.name as deptName from medical_record m join patient_user_info_card p on p.id=m.user_id join doctor d on m.doctor_id=d.id join medical_dept md on m.dept_id=md.id where 1=1 and p.name like '%${name}%' and d.name like '%${doctor_name}%' and md.id=${dept_id} and m.date= STR_TO_DATE('${date}','%Y-%m-%d') and m.status!=4 limit ${length} offset #{start}

select count(*) from medical_record m join patient_user_info_card p on p.id=m.user_id join doctor d on m.doctor_id=d.id join medical_dept md on m.dept_id=md.id where 1=1 and p.name like '%${name}%' and d.name like '%${doctor_name}%' and md.id=${dept_id} and m.date= STR_TO_DATE('${date}','%Y-%m-%d') and m.status!=4

select mds.name as deptSubName,d.name as doctorName,p.name, p.sex,p.birthday,mr.diagnosis,mr.prescription,p.uuid from medical_record as mr join patient_user_info_crad p on p.id=mr.user_id join medical_dept_sub_and_doctor as mdsad on mdsad.doctor_id=mr.doctor_id join medical_dept_sub as mds on mds.id=mdsad.dept_sub_id join doctor as d on d.id=mr.doctor_id where p.user_id=#{id}
